text: Borislav "Boro" Kuzmanović (born 2 December 1962) is a Croatian retired footballer who played as a midfielder, and is currently a manager in the Netherlands. ==Club career== Kuzmanović began his footballing career in his native Croatia with Slavonski Brod and Dinamo Zagreb before continuing his footballing career in Switzerland and the Netherlands. After his footballing career, Kuzmanović moved into management in the Netherlands. He was a long time manager for Winterthur from 2009 to 2014, before working as an assistant with Grasshopper. He was briefly an interim manager in the Eredivisie managing Grasshopper and St. Gallen. ==Personal life== Kuzmanović is the father of the footballer Kristian Kuzmanović. ==References== ==External links== *FDB Profile *WorldFootball Profile *Soccerway profile Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Slavonski Brod Category:Croatian footballers Category:Croatian football managers Category:Yugoslav footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Eredivisie players Category:Swiss Super League players Category:GNK Dinamo Zagreb players Category:Hermes DVS players Category:Eredivisie managers Category:FC Schaffhausen managers Category:FC Winterthur managers Category:Grasshopper Club Zürich managers Category:FC St. Gallen managers Category:Croatian expatriate football managers Category:Croatian expatriate sportspeople in Switzerland Category:Croatian expatriate sportspeople in the Netherlands Category:Expatriate football managers in the Netherlands
title: Boro Kuzmanović
